@Kalika1, Your best bet might be to try using one program to rip and another to compress and sometimes you may still want to use a 3rd program to do your burning. This may sound confusing but its not. Just a lot as dragging and dropping files between programs until you get the result you are looking for. If you are just looking to make perfect copies of DVD's then Any DVD Cloner Platinum is the easiest and best at busting through copyguards!!Good luck!!
